attr.title: Descent 1 & 2
attr.desc: A port of the 1995 DOS game Descent and 1996 DOS game Descent 2 by Parallax Software. Comes with the shareware demo files. Provide your own full game files via GOG or Steam.
attr.inst: Unzip to ports folder.  To update to full game, remove demo files from descent/Data and add DESCENT.HOG and DESCENT.PIG to descent/Data.
